# dataSource

**Instance Property**

The data source for the picker view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var dataSource: (any UIPickerViewDataSource)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The data source must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPickerViewDataSource] protocol and implement the required methods to return the number of components and the number of rows in each component.

## Providing the picker data

- **UIPickerViewDataSource**: The interface for a picker view’s data source.
